name: Baldi's Basics Android Don't Break The Rules V.1.4.1b
name_original: Baldi's Basics Android Don't Break The Rules V.1.4.1b
description:
Install instructions

This is a script based mod for baldi's basics in education and learning! This mod was inspired by MissingTextureMan101's No Running In The Halls Mod, which you can check out here


Anyways, you have to not break the rules or else, well, you'll find out something bad happens.

Here are rules to follow:
No Eating Zesty Bars
No Failing Playtime's Jumps
No Entering Staff Only Rooms
No Playing Endless Mode
No Running

No Using LSODA's


Things Changed:
BSODA Is Slighly Slower And Its Renamed To LSODA
Gotta Sweep Is Active From The Beginning
Some Items Have New Names
The YCTP Looks Better
Breaking The Rules (Obviously)
When You Get Caught By The Principal
